ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Roast in it today because you were kafirun.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Roast in it now for having disbelieved."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Burn in it on account of your disbelieving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Suffer therein on this day for your disbelief.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Enter it this day – the recompense of your disbelief.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Burn (enter) therein this Day, for that you used to disbelieve.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Enter into it this day because you disbelieved.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: roast well in it today, for that you were unbelievers!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Burn therein this day for that ye disbelieved.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Enter it this Day on account of your denial of the truth."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Roast therein To-day for that ye have been disbelieving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Enter it today, because of what you used to deny.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Embrace ye the (fire) this Day, for that ye (persistently) rejected (Truth)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Burn therein this Day, for that you used to disbelieve.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Roast well therein this Day for you were unbelievers'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Roast in it today, because you persistently disbelieved.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Enter to] burn therein today for what you used to deny."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:64] Burn therein today [as chastisement] for that which you used to reject!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Burn therein this day for that you disbelieved) in it and also because of your denial of the Scriptures and the messengers.
